args.name: files
args.help: The input SAM/BAM/CRAM files.

args.name: output
args.help: The output HDF5 file.

args.name: fasta
args.help: The reference FASTA file.

args.name: overwrite
args.help: Overwrite an existing HDF5 file.

args.name: rebuild
args.help: Rebuild all index files.

args.name: compression
args.help: Compression level of the HDF5 output (0-9).

args.name: print_every
args.help: How often (in seconds) to print statistics.

args.name: joint
args.help: Compute pairwise modification counts.

args.name: tokenize
args.help: Tokenize the reference sequences.

args.name: min_mapq
args.help: Mapping quality threshold for alignment processing.

args.name: min_quality
args.help: PHRED score threshold for base processing.

args.name: min_length
args.help: Skip reads shorter than this length.

args.name: max_length
args.help: Skip reads longer than this length.

args.name: max_hamming
args.help: The maximum number of mismatches, insertions, and deletions in a processed read.

args.name: secondary
args.help: Consider secondary alignments for processing as well.

args.name: downsample
args.help: Limit read depths per reference.

args.name: ignore_bases
args.help: Do not count mismatches or deletions occuring at these bases. Pass as a single string.

args.name: max_indel_length
args.help: The longest indels to consider.

args.name: quality_window
args.help: Check the quality of each base in a window of this size around each base.

args.name: collapse
args.help: Collapse modifications within this distance of each other in a given read.

args.name: chunk_size
args.help: The number of references to process at a time per thread.

args.name: no_mismatch
args.help: Do not count mismatches as modifications.

args.name: no_insertion
args.help: Do not count insertions as modifications.

args.name: no_deletion
args.help: Do not count deletions as modifications.

args.name: no_reverse
args.help: Ignore reverse-complemented reads.

args.name: only_reverse
args.help: Use only reverse-complemented reads.

args.name: uniform_spread
args.help: Uniformly spread out ambiguous deletions.

args.name: no_spread
args.help: Do not spread ambiguous deletions.

args.name: disable_ambiguous
args.help: Disable the ambiguous deletion detection algorithm, relying on the deletion provided by the alignment.

args.name: no_filter_matches
args.help: Do not filter matches based on their PHRED base score.

args.name: no_filter_insertions
args.help: Do not filter insertions based on their PHRED base score.

args.name: no_filter_deletions
args.help: Do not filter deletions based on their PHRED base score.
